annotations.description: The one where the guys make another brilliant Viewer Created Cocktail and Leandro Clunkily promotes our new channel Barfly Freepour and Marius keep Leandro o...
annotations.title: The viewer created Bitter Fingers using one of my Favorite Amari

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml)  Zucca Rabarbaro
1oz (30ml) orgeat
.5oz (15ml) rye whiskey (high proof may be used)
.75oz (22.5ml) lemon juice
.75oz (22.5ml) pineapple juice
5 dashes angostura bitters
Garnish: lemon twist/cherry

Shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with one large cube.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pyRKW4srFlo
title: Bitter Finger
